sources.title: Cowboy and the Senorita
sources.description: Chip (Mary Lee) has inherited a supposedly worthless gold mine from her father and Craig Allen is about to buy it. Roy suspects the mine may be valuable and using a clue left by Chip's father, investigates. He finds the hidden shaft that contains the gold and with the posse chasing him on a trumped up robbery charge, races to town with ore samples hoping to get there before the ownership is transferred

sources.title: Cowboy and the Senorita (1944) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Mary Lee
Director: Joseph Kane

Chip has inherited a supposedly worthless gold mine from her father and Craig Allen is about to buy it.

sources.title: Cowboy and the Senorita (1944) Roy Rogers & Dale Evans |  Western | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Romance! Rhythm! Revelry! with Roy Rogers!  
Bad guy Craig Allen, gambler and town boss, tries to take a gold mine inherited by innocent Chip Williams on her seventeenth birthday. Roy and his pal 'Teddy' Bear ride to help the girl and her cousin.
 
Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: Gordon Kahn, Bradford Ropes 
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Mary Lee & Dale Evans
Genres: Western

He finds the hidden shaft that contains the gold and with the posse chasing him on a trumped up robbery charge, races to town with ore samples hoping to get there before the ownership is transferred.
